修复了snippet中有两个`就不能正确使用的问题

old
{{{
	"if stridx(snippet, '`') != -1
		"while match(snippet, '`.\{-}`') != -1
			"let snippet = substitute(snippet, '`.\{-}`',
						"\ substitute(eval(matchstr(snippet, '`\zs.\{-}\ze`')),
						"\ "\n\\%$", '', ''), '')
		"endw
		"let snippet = substitute(snippet, "\r", "\n", 'g')
	"endif
    }}}
	
new
{{{
	if stridx(snippet, '`') != -1
		while match(snippet, '`.\{-}(.\{-}).\{-}`') != -1
			let snippet = substitute(snippet, '`.\{-}`',
						\ substitute(eval(matchstr(snippet, '`\zs.\{-}\ze`')),
						\ "\n\\%$", '', ''), '')
		endw
		let snippet = substitute(snippet, "\r", "\n", 'g')
	endif
    }}}
